frame.name: Kimmi Beans
frame.ogDescription: Mint cute, unique beans daily. Collect your favorites and enjoy the world of Kimmi Beans!
frame.subtitle: Mint cute beans every day!
frame.description: Kimmi Beans is a cute minting mini app where every tap gives you a new, unique bean with its own personality. Collect daily beans, show them off, and discover rare, silly, and legendary beans in the world of Kimmi!
